ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: newbie faq
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i think many who play it for some time, they will know those links. but i think, many newbies have the problems to get started with all those links. imho a
ygData.messageBody:
On 22 Oct 2002 at 9:01, Vash The Stampede wrote:

> there are some sites that do that stuff already kind of heh, also
> trade skills sites
> [...]
> www.gucomics.com site just for fun ^_^

i think many who play it for some time, they will know those links.
but i think, many newbies have the problems to get started with all
those links. imho a "printed compilation" could help them to get
around all the information.


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, level 56 female gnome magician
Urva Ceindrech, level 51 female dark-elf wizard
Delaney Arianwen, level 51 female high-elf cleric
Latrodectus Mactans - Tarew Marr
